languages.text: "Надо очень чутко прислушиваться к чуждой мелодии и шагать ровно в такт. Звучание ее мрачное и опасное, но хору страданий не вторит. Это не значит, что танец не будет кровавым, но, побыв ведомым, можно потом оказаться ведущим".

traits.locale_text: "Надо очень чутко прислушиваться к чуждой мелодии и шагать ровно в такт. Звучание ее мрачное и опасное, но хору страданий не вторит. Это не значит, что танец не будет кровавым, но, побыв ведомым, можно потом оказаться ведущим".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."
languages.original_text: "Надо очень чутко прислушиваться к чуждой мелодии и шагать ровно в такт. Звучание ее мрачное и опасное, но хору страданий не вторит. Это не значит, что танец не будет кровавым, но, побыв ведомым, можно потом оказаться ведущим".

traits.locale_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你必须仔细聆听那古怪的旋律，伴着它不断前进。尽管它的乐曲令人沮丧、充满危险，但它并没有回应着那痛苦的合唱。这并非意味着它的舞步不会沾染血腥，但只要你掌握了它的旋律，你便可以成为领舞之人。”
languages.original_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."

traits.locale_text: “你必须仔细聆听那古怪的旋律，伴着它不断前进。尽管它的乐曲令人沮丧、充满危险，但它并没有回应着那痛苦的合唱。这并非意味着它的舞步不会沾染血腥，但只要你掌握了它的旋律，你便可以成为领舞之人。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."

languages.text: «Debes prestar atención a la extraña melodía y caminar a su son. Su música es funesta y peligrosa, pero no es un eco del coro del tormento. Eso no significa que el baile no vaya a ser sangriento, pero, cuando lo aprendas, podrás marcar su ritmo».
languages.original_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."

traits.locale_text: «Debes prestar atención a la extraña melodía y caminar a su son. Su música es funesta y peligrosa, pero no es un eco del coro del tormento. Eso no significa que el baile no vaya a ser sangriento, pero, cuando lo aprendas, podrás marcar su ritmo».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「奇妙な旋律に耳を澄まし、それに合わせて歩を進めなければならない。その音楽は陰惨で危険だが、苦悩のコーラスの残響はない。だからといって、ダンスが血なまぐさくならないとは限らない。けれど、ひとたびをそれを理解すれば、ステップをリードできるはず」
languages.original_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."

traits.locale_text: 「奇妙な旋律に耳を澄まし、それに合わせて歩を進めなければならない。その音楽は陰惨で危険だが、苦悩のコーラスの残響はない。だからといって、ダンスが血なまぐさくならないとは限らない。けれど、ひとたびをそれを理解すれば、ステップをリードできるはず」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr müsst der eigenartigen Melodie aufmerksam lauschen und im richtigen Rhythmus mitschreiten. Ihre Musik ist düster und gefährlich, doch sie lässt nicht den Chor der Qualen widerhallen. Das bedeutet nicht, dass der Tanz nicht blutig sein wird, doch wenn Ihr ihn erst einmal gelernt habt, könnt Ihr führen."
languages.original_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst der eigenartigen Melodie aufmerksam lauschen und im richtigen Rhythmus mitschreiten. Ihre Musik ist düster und gefährlich, doch sie lässt nicht den Chor der Qualen widerhallen. Das bedeutet nicht, dass der Tanz nicht blutig sein wird, doch wenn Ihr ihn erst einmal gelernt habt, könnt Ihr führen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Il faut prêter attention à l'étrange mélodie et avancer à son rythme. Bien que sa musique soit triste et funeste, elle ne fait pas écho au chœur du tourment. Ça ne veut pas dire que la valse ne sera pas sanglante, mais une fois que vous aurez appris les pas, vous pourrez mener la danse. »
languages.original_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut prêter attention à l'étrange mélodie et avancer à son rythme. Bien que sa musique soit triste et funeste, elle ne fait pas écho au chœur du tourment. Ça ne veut pas dire que la valse ne sera pas sanglante, mais une fois que vous aurez appris les pas, vous pourrez mener la danse. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bu tuhaf melodiye iyi kulak asarak onun ritmine ayak uydurmalısın. Dinlediğin müzik, kasvet ve tehlikeyle bezenmiş olsa da nakaratı eziyetten yoksun. Bu dansın kana bulanmayacağının garantisi yok ancak dansı kavradığın an, adımları sen yönlendirebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "You must listen well to the strange melody and step in time with it. Its music is dismal and dangerous, but it does not echo the chorus of torment. This does not mean the dance will not be bloody, but once you learn it, you can lead the steps."

traits.locale_text: "Bu tuhaf melodiye iyi kulak asarak onun ritmine ayak uydurmalısın. Dinlediğin müzik, kasvet ve tehlikeyle bezenmiş olsa da nakaratı eziyetten yoksun. Bu dansın kana bulanmayacağının garantisi yok ancak dansı kavradığın an, adımları sen yönlendirebilirsin."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
